superheroes

Class SuperHeroes

  • java.lang.Object
    • superheroes.SuperHeroes
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlackPanther, CaptainMarvel, DoctorStrange, IronMan, Spiderman, Wolverine

    public class SuperHeroes
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    vsh33 SuperHeroes is a class that holds all the attributes of a hero, and enables the changing of these attributes. SuperHeroes are the characters controlled by the user in the game.

      • getRecoveryRate

        public int getRecoveryRate()
        Gets the recovery rate.
        Returns:
        recoveryRate int - This is the scaling factor for how fast a hero heals in hospital.

      • setRecoveryRate

        public void setRecoveryRate(int recoveryRate)
        Sets the recovery rate.
        Parameters:
        recoveryRate - int - Scaling factor for how fast the hero heals in hospital.

      • getShield

        public boolean getShield()
        Checks if the hero has a shield equipped. Shield will absorb one villain attack.
        Returns:
        boolean - Whether or not the hero has a shield.

      • setShield

        public void setShield(boolean shield)
        Sets the hero's shield to on or off. Shield will absorb one villain attack.
        Parameters:
        shield - boolean - Whether the hero has shield or not.

      • hasIncreasedOdds

        public boolean hasIncreasedOdds()
        Checks if the hero has the increasedOdds power up. Increased odds caps the villain's roll at 4 in the dice roll game.
        Returns:
        boolean - Whether or not the hero has increasedOdds.

      • setIncreasedOdds

        public void setIncreasedOdds(boolean increasedOdds)
        Sets the increasedOdds power up on or off. Increased odds caps the villain's roll at 4 in the dice roll game.
        Parameters:
        increasedOdds - boolean - Whether the hero has this power up or not.

      • hasGauntletDamage

        public boolean hasGauntletDamage()
        Checks if the hero has the gauntlet power up. Gauntlet makes the hero take and receive twice as much damage in combat.
        Returns:
        boolean gauntleyDamage - True if the hero has gauntlet, false if not.

      • setGauntletDamage

        public void setGauntletDamage(boolean gauntletDamage)
        Sets the gauntletDamage power up on or off. Gauntlet makes the hero take and receive twice as much damage in combat.
        Parameters:
        gauntletDamage - boolean - whether the hero has the power up or not.

      • hasMarvelDamage

        public boolean hasMarvelDamage()
        Checks if the hero has the Marvel Damage power up. Marvel damage enables the hero to take two of the villain's lives instead of one, when the hero wins a battle.
        Returns:
        boolean marvelDamage - True if the hero has Marvel Damage, false if not.

      • setMarvelDamage

        public void setMarvelDamage(boolean marvelDamage)
        Sets the Marvel Damage power up on or off. Marvel damage enables the hero to take two of the villain's lives instead of one, when the hero wins a battle.
        Parameters:
        marvelDamage - boolean - whether the hero has the power up or not.

      • getDamageReduction

        public int getDamageReduction()
        Returns the hero's damage reduction.
        Returns:
        int damageReduction - The amount that villain damage is decremented bym before it's taken from the hero's health.

      • setDamageReduction

        public void setDamageReduction(int damageReduction)
        Sets the hero's damage reduction.
        Parameters:
        damageReduction - int the amount that villain damage is decremented bym before it's taken from the hero's health.

      • usePowerUp

        public java.lang.String usePowerUp(PowerUps powerUp)
        This method is called to apply one of the game's power up to the hero, altering their damage reduction, granting increased game odds, or granting extra damage.
        Parameters:
        powerUp - PowerUps - This is the powerUp item to be applied to the hero.
        Returns:
        message - This returns a success string informing the user of which attributes have changed.

      • alterHealth

        public void alterHealth(int amount)
        Alters the hero's health attribute. Used to increment hero health in the hospital. Health is forcibly kept within the bounds of 0 and 100.
        Parameters:
        amount - int - The value of health to be added.

      • takeVillainDamage

        public int takeVillainDamage(SuperVillains villain)
        Applies damage to the hero based on the villain in combat. Damage is taken from the villain and modified based on special abilities shield and gauntlet.
        Parameters:
        villain - SuperVillains - The villain the hero is fighting. Damage is calculated based on the villain.
        Returns:
        int damage - The amount of health the hero lost.

      • getStats

        public java.lang.String getStats()
        This method formats useful information about the hero, to be displayed.
        Returns:
        stats - The formatted information detailing the hero's attributes.
